trans-unit.source: Manages user interface in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia a interface do usuário no designer.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> is created, it adds a transparent window over the designer frame.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> é criado, ele adiciona uma janela transparente sobre o quadro de designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> can then use this window to render user interface elements, called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, as well as catch all mouse messages.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> pode usar essa janela para renderizar elementos de interface do usuário, chamados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objetos, como também captura todas as mensagens de mouse.

trans-unit.source: In this way, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> can control designer behavior.
trans-unit.target: Dessa forma, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> pode controlar o comportamento do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class supports a behavior stack, onto which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> objects can be pushed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe oferece suporte a uma pilha de comportamento, no qual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> objetos podem ser enviados.

trans-unit.source: When a message is intercepted through the transparent window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> can send the message to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma mensagem for interceptada pela janela transparente, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> pode enviar a mensagem para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> na parte superior da pilha.

trans-unit.source: This enables different user interface modes depending on the currently pushed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que os modos de interface de usuário diferente dependendo atualmente enviado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> is used to render all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, such as selection borders, sizing handles, and smart tags.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> é usado para processar todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objetos, como bordas de seleção, alças de dimensionamento e marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> also controls many design-time behaviors, such as using snaplines, dragging, and selecting.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> também controla vários comportamentos de tempo de design, como usando guias de alinhamento, arrastando e selecionando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [visão geral do serviço de comportamento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create your own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> based class that responds to user clicks.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar seu próprio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> com base em classe que responde a cliques do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of adorner.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de adorno.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> property provides access to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> propriedade fornece acesso para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> gerenciados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objects to and remove them from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objetos e removê-los de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for the adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> para a janela de adorno.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for the adorner window.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> da janela adorno.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value to transform.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> a ser transformado.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in the adorner window to screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> na janela de adorno em coordenadas da tela.

trans-unit.source: The transformed <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> transformado, em coordenadas de tela.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the adorner window in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o local da janela de adorno em coordenadas da tela.

trans-unit.source: The location, from the upper-left corner of the adorner window, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O local, no canto superior esquerdo da janela de adorno, em coordenadas da tela.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> starts a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> inicia uma operação do tipo "arrastar e soltar".

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.BeginDrag> event immediately before it starts a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.BeginDrag> evento imediatamente antes de ele inicia uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> delimitador de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> translated to the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> delimitador de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> convertido nas coordenadas da janela de adorno.

trans-unit.source: The adorner window is a transparent window that resides on top of the designer's frame.
trans-unit.target: A janela de adorno é uma janela transparente que reside na parte superior do quadro do designer.

trans-unit.source: This window is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> to intercept all messages.
trans-unit.target: Esta janela é usada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> para interceptar todas as mensagens.

trans-unit.source: It also serves as a unified canvas on which to paint a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: Ele também serve como uma tela unificada no qual desenhar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> translated to adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o local de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> convertido nas coordenadas da janela de adorno.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value indicating the location of <paramref name="c" /> in adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que indica o local do <paramref name="c" /> em coordenadas da janela de adorno.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir faz parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> at the top of the behavior stack without removing it.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> na parte superior da pilha de comportamento sem removê-lo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> at the top of the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> na parte superior da pilha de comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A> método deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A>, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> completes a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> conclui uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.EndDrag> event immediately after the drag operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.EndDrag> evento imediatamente após a operação de arrastar é concluído.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> preceding the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> to be returned.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> que precede o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> immediately after the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> imediatamente após o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> determinado na pilha de comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> immediately after <paramref name="behavior" /> in the behavior stack, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no following behavior.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> imediatamente após o <paramref name="behavior" /> na pilha de comportamento ou <see langword="null" /> se não houver nenhum comportamento a seguir.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the adorner window of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Invalida a janela de adorno do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the adorner window of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Invalida a janela de adorno do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> method forces a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objects and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> método força uma atualização de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objetos e, por sua vez, todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The rectangular area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: A área retangular a ser invalidada.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates, within the adorner window, the specified area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Invalida, dentro da janela de adorno, a área especificada do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> method will force a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> método forçará uma atualização de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> e, por sua vez, todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The region to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: A região a ser invalidada.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates, within the adorner window, the specified area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Invalida, dentro da janela de adorno, a área especificada do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> method will force a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> método forçará uma atualização de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> e, por sua vez, todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An adorner window's handle.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de uma janela de adorno.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in a handle's coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> no sistema de coordenadas de um identificador.

trans-unit.source: Converts a point in a handle's coordinate system to the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Converte um ponto no sistema de coordenadas de um identificador nas coordenadas da janela de adorno.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> nas coordenadas da janela de adorno.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> to remove from the stack.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> a ser removido da pilha.

trans-unit.source: Removes and returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: Remove e retorna o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> na parte superior da pilha.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> that was removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> que foi removido da pilha.

trans-unit.source: Removes the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> from the behavior stack internally maintained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Remove a atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> da pilha de comportamento mantida internamente pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> stack is empty.
trans-unit.target: A pilha <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> está vazia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> to push.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> a ter o push efetuado.

trans-unit.source: Pushes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> onto the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Efetua push de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> para a pilha de comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushBehavior%2A> method is often performed by means of a hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushBehavior%2A> método geralmente é realizado por meio de uma ocorrência testado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="behavior" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="behavior" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> to push.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> a ter o push efetuado.

trans-unit.source: Pushes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> onto the behavior stack and assigns mouse capture to the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Efetua push de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> para a pilha de comportamento e atribui a captura do mouse ao comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Pushing a capture behavior is often done through a hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: Enviar um comportamento de captura geralmente é feito por meio de uma ocorrência testado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.

trans-unit.source: If a behavior calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A> method and mouse capture is lost, the behavior's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se um comportamento chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A> captura do mouse e o método é perdido, o comportamento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="behavior" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="behavior" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value to transform.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> a ser transformado.

trans-unit.source: Translates a point in screen coordinates into the adorner window coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte um ponto em coordenadas da tela nas coordenadas da janela de adorno do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: The transformed <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value, in adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> transformado, em coordenadas da janela de adorno.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current selection should be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a seleção atual deve ser atualizada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Synchronizes all selection glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Sincroniza todos os glifos de seleção.
